reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and true to size, with one mentioning it comes down to the ankle.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering cut, beautiful teal fabric.
items.body: Very pretty style, flattering fit. I think it would be flattering on a lot of different body types. Comfortable and appears well made. Read more
items.author: Jenny Goodwin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great length for short girls!
items.body: I ordered the dresss as a back up since another order is delayed from a different site for a wedding. and the wedding I am going prefers floor length dresses. I am 5'1" so it is difficult to find this! The dress fits as described and is perfect for my height if I wear 1-2 inch heals. The color is beautiful! Read more
items.author: Mary Beth Young

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and cozy!
items.body: Loved this dress! I am 5’9 and it came down to my ankle, it’s soft and comfortable. Runs true to size! Read more
items.author: lifewithtif

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Dress
items.body: This dress looks way better in person and is very flattering! Read more
items.author: LLM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressy yet comfortable
items.body: So comfortable and adorable on Read more
items.author: Shelley A King

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this dream dress!
items.body: This is such a beautiful dress! I am 160 lbs and 5'0" inches tall but the large size worked perfect. The lace on the sleeves and the bottom are a nice touch. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simplee Women's Formal Velvet Maxi Dress
items.body: Fit perfect and length was as described very comfortable and a great purchase. Read more
items.author: Clark Nichols

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't actually stretch at the waist.
items.body: The waist is too tight, even for being stretchy. Read more
items.author: Kristen Markowski

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve Formal V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Short Sleeve Formal V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Wine Red, Rust, Blue Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
